name: Londes Digital Marketing

description:
Londes Digital Marketing (LDM) provides digital marketing services to a wide range of clients. Their major services include PPC consulting and management, SEO consulting and vendor services, and web analytics audits and consulting. By taking a quantitative yet creative approach to online marketing solutions, LDM delivers long-term ROI gains and continually improving campaigns.
PPC Services: Campaign Audits, PPC Setups, PPC Management, Google Adwords, Bing Ads, Social Media (Facebook, LinkedIn), Media Placements
SEO Services: SEO Audits, Consulting Services, Vendor Services
Web Analytics Consulting: Google Analytics, Usability Audits, Sales Performance, Funnel Optimization, Conversion Rate Optimization, A/B Testing, Multivariate Testing
